lines.text: ...Huh. This is... a puddle of wax?
Looks like it. The color made me think blood at first, but it's definitely wax when you look close.
There's some candles in this puddle, half-melted...
Well, some are completely melted. You can see the wicks floating in it, see?
Oh, yeah. Was wonderin' what those stringy things were.
...They're white. It doesn't look like these candles were ever actually... lit.
So somethin' melted a bunch of unlit candles on the floor?
Probably the big huge fire that apparently happened right next to them, yeah.
A puddle of melted wax candles. Weird... their wicks haven't been lit.
